channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Storefront Footer Text
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Storefront Footer Text

item.title: CVE-2021-24607|2024-08-03T19:35:20.210Z -- unknown -- storefront%20footer%20text
item.description: The Storefront Footer Text WordPress plugin through 1.0.1 does not sanitize and escape the "Footer Credit Text" added to pages, allowing high privilege users to perform Cross-Site Scripting attacks even when the unfiltered-html capability is disallowed.
